snippet: Penn State University’s former president Graham Spanier is dropping a lawsuit that sought the release of his university emails involving convicted predator Jerry Sandusky.
abstract: Penn State University’s former president Graham Spanier is dropping a lawsuit that sought the release of his university emails involving convicted predator Jerry Sandusky.
lead_paragraph: Penn State University’s former president Graham Spanier is dropping a lawsuit that sought the release of his university emails involving convicted predator Jerry Sandusky.

headline.seo: Graham Spanier, Ex-Penn State President, Drops Lawsuit for Own Emails
headline.main: Ex-Penn State President Drops Lawsuit for Own Emails
